
// AUTO-GENERATED by camel-package-maven-plugin - DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE
= camel jolokia

Attach Jolokia JVM Agent to a running Camel integration


== Usage

[source,bash]
----
camel jolokia [options]
----



== Options

[cols="2,5,1,2",options="header"]
|===
| Option | Description | Default | Type
| `--port` | To use a specific port number when attaching Jolokia JVM Agent (default a free port is found in range 8778-9999) |  | int
| `--stop` | Stops the Jolokia JVM Agent in the running Camel integration |  | boolean
| `-h,--help` | Display the help and sub-commands |  | boolean
|===
